This tool runs entirely in your browser. No data is uploaded to any server.

## 1. Project Import (Optional)

Upload an existing REDCap project XML to extract existing configuration. This helps when modifying an existing EMA setup.

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
viewof xmlFile = Inputs.file({
  label: "REDCap Project XML",
  accept: ".xml"
})
```

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
parsedProject = {
  if (!xmlFile) return null;
  const text = await xmlFile.text();
  const project = parseRedcapXml(text);

  // If we found EMA fields, parse them into samples
  if (project.emaFields.length > 0) {
    const parsedSamples = [];

    project.emaFields.forEach((field, idx) => {
      // Parse field name like "ema_deliver_at_d01_s02" or "deliver_at_d01_s02"
      const nameMatch = field.name.match(/_d(\d+)_s(\d+)$/);
      if (!nameMatch) return;

      const day = parseInt(nameMatch[1]);
      const sample = parseInt(nameMatch[2]);

      // Parse @CALCDATE annotation to extract timing
      // Pattern: @CALCDATE([field], (X * 1440) + START + mod([rand], DURATION), 'm')
      const calcMatch = field.annotation.match(/@CALCDATE\([^,]+,\s*\((\d+)\s*\*\s*1440\)\s*\+\s*(\d+)\s*\+\s*mod\([^,]+,\s*(\d+)\)/);

      let startMinutes = 540; // default 9 AM
      let duration = 90; // default 90 min

      if (calcMatch) {
        startMinutes = parseInt(calcMatch[2]);
        duration = parseInt(calcMatch[3]);
      }

      parsedSamples.push({
        id: idx + 1,
        day,
        sample,
        periodIdx: (sample - 1) % 10, // rough guess
        startMinutes,
        duration
      });
    });

    // Sort by day then sample
    parsedSamples.sort((a, b) => a.day - b.day || a.sample - b.sample);

    // Update mutable samples
    if (parsedSamples.length > 0) {
      mutable samples = parsedSamples;
    }
  }

  return project;
}
```

```{ojs}

  <small>${parsedProject.forms.length} forms, ${parsedProject.events.length} events, ${parsedProject.emaFields.length} existing EMA fields detected</small>
</div>` : ""}`
```

## 3. Define Periods

Periods are the time windows during which EMA samples can be scheduled. Each sample will be randomly placed within its assigned period.

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
viewof periods = {
  const container = html`<div></div>`;

  let data = [
    { id: 1, startHour: 9, startMin: 15, duration: 90 },
    { id: 2, startHour: 13, startMin: 15, duration: 90 }
  ];

  function formatTime(hour, min) {
    const h = hour % 12 || 12;
    const ampm = hour < 12 ? "AM" : "PM";
    return `${h}:${String(min).padStart(2, '0')} ${ampm}`;
  }

  function render() {
    container.innerHTML = "";

    const table = html`<table class="table table-striped">
      <thead>
        <tr>
          <th>#</th>
          <th>Start Time</th>
          <th>Duration</th>
          <th>Window End</th>
          <th></th>
        </tr>
      </thead>
      <tbody></tbody>
    </table>`;

    const tbody = table.querySelector("tbody");

    data.forEach((period, idx) => {
      const startMinutes = period.startHour * 60 + period.startMin;
      const endMinutes = startMinutes + period.duration;
      const endHour = Math.floor(endMinutes / 60);
      const endMin = endMinutes % 60;

      const row = html`<tr>
        <td class="text-muted">${idx + 1}</td>
        <td>
          <div style="display: flex; align-items: center; gap: 4px;">
            <input type="number" class="form-control form-control-sm" style="width: 65px"
              value="${period.startHour}" min="0" max="23" data-field="startHour">
            <span>:</span>
            <input type="number" class="form-control form-control-sm" style="width: 65px"
              value="${period.startMin}" min="0" max="59" step="5" data-field="startMin">
          </div>
        </td>
        <td><input type="number" class="form-control form-control-sm" style="width: 80px" value="${period.duration}" min="1" data-field="duration"> min</td>
        <td class="text-muted">${formatTime(endHour, endMin)}</td>
        <td><button style="background: white; border: 1px solid #dc3545; color: #dc3545; padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer;" class="remove-btn" title="Remove period">&times;</button></td>
      </tr>`;

      row.querySelectorAll("input").forEach(input => {
        input.addEventListener("change", () => {
          const field = input.dataset.field;
          data[idx][field] = parseInt(input.value) || 0;
          container.value = [...data];
          container.dispatchEvent(new Event("input", { bubbles: true }));
          render();
        });
      });

      row.querySelector(".remove-btn").addEventListener("click", () => {
        data = data.filter((_, i) => i !== idx);
        container.value = [...data];
        container.dispatchEvent(new Event("input", { bubbles: true }));
        render();
      });

      tbody.appendChild(row);
    });

    const addBtn = document.createElement("button");
    addBtn.style.cssText = "background: white; border: 1px solid #0d6efd; color: #0d6efd; padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer;";
    addBtn.textContent = "+ Add Period";
    addBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
      const maxId = Math.max(0, ...data.map(d => d.id));
      data.push({ id: maxId + 1, startHour: 9, startMin: 0, duration: 90 });
      container.value = [...data];
      container.dispatchEvent(new Event("input", { bubbles: true }));
      render();
    });

    container.appendChild(table);
    container.appendChild(addBtn);
  }

  container.value = [...data];
  render();
  return container;
}
```

## 4. Sample Schedule

Generate a schedule with a fixed number of days and samples per day.

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
viewof numDays = Inputs.number({
  label: "Number of days",
  value: 7,
  min: 1,
  max: 30,
  step: 1,
  width: 120
})

viewof samplesPerDay = Inputs.number({
  label: "Samples per day",
  value: periods.length,
  min: 1,
  max: 10,
  step: 1,
  width: 120
})

generateButton = {
  const btn = document.createElement("button");
  btn.style.cssText = "background: #0d6efd; border: 1px solid #0d6efd; color: white; padding: 0.375rem 0.75rem; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer; font-weight: 500;";
  btn.textContent = "Generate Schedule";
  btn.addEventListener("click", () => {
    const newSamples = [];
    let sampleNum = 1;

    for (let day = 1; day <= numDays; day++) {
      for (let s = 1; s <= samplesPerDay; s++) {
        const periodIdx = (s - 1) % periods.length;
        const period = periods[periodIdx];
        newSamples.push({
          id: sampleNum++,
          day: day,
          sample: s,
          periodIdx: periodIdx,
          startMinutes: period ? period.startHour * 60 + period.startMin : 540,
          duration: period?.duration || 90
        });
      }
    }

    mutable samples = newSamples;
  });
  return btn;
}
```

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
mutable samples = []
```

### Generated Schedule

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
sampleTableDisplay = {
  if (samples.length === 0) {
    return html`<p class="text-muted">No samples defined yet. Use Generate Schedule above or import a project XML.</p>`;
  }

  function formatTime(minutes) {
    const hour = Math.floor(minutes / 60);
    const min = minutes % 60;
    const h = hour % 12 || 12;
    const ampm = hour < 12 ? "AM" : "PM";
    return `${h}:${String(min).padStart(2, '0')} ${ampm}`;
  }

  const totalDays = Math.max(...samples.map(s => s.day));

  const tableContainer = html`<div>
    <table class="table table-sm table-hover">
      <thead>
        <tr>
          <th>Day</th>
          <th>Sample</th>
          <th>Field Name</th>
          <th>Window</th>
          <th></th>
        </tr>
      </thead>
      <tbody></tbody>
    </table>
    <p class="text-muted"><strong>${samples.length}</strong> samples across <strong>${totalDays}</strong> days</p>
  </div>`;

  const tbody = tableContainer.querySelector("tbody");

  samples.forEach((sample, idx) => {
    const dayPadded = String(sample.day).padStart(2, '0');
    const samplePadded = String(sample.sample).padStart(2, '0');
    const fieldName = `${deliverAtPrefix}_d${dayPadded}_s${samplePadded}`;
    const endMinutes = sample.startMinutes + sample.duration;

    const row = html`<tr>
      <td>${sample.day}</td>
      <td>${sample.sample}</td>
      <td><code style="font-size: 0.85em;">${fieldName}</code></td>
      <td class="text-muted">${formatTime(sample.startMinutes)} â€“ ${formatTime(endMinutes)}</td>
      <td></td>
    </tr>`;

    const deleteBtn = document.createElement("button");
    deleteBtn.style.cssText = "background: white; border: 1px solid #dc3545; color: #dc3545; padding: 0.25rem 0.5rem; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer;";
    deleteBtn.innerHTML = "&times;";
    deleteBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
      mutable samples = samples.filter((_, i) => i !== idx);
    });
    row.querySelector("td:last-child").appendChild(deleteBtn);

    tbody.appendChild(row);
  });

  return tableContainer;
}
```

## 6. Download Files

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
// Hardcoded LCG constants (Numerical Recipes values)
LCG_A = "1664525"
LCG_C = "1013904223"
LCG_M = "4294967296"

generatedOutputs = {
  if (samples.length === 0) return null;

  return {
    dictionary: generateDataDictionary({
      samples, configForm, startField, randPrefix, seedField,
      deliverAtPrefix, fieldNameA, fieldNameC, fieldNameM,
      LCG_A, LCG_C, LCG_M, asiSurveyForm, parsedProject
    }),
    events: generateEvents({ samples, eventPrefix, armNum, enrollmentEvent, parsedProject }),
    mappings: generateEventMappings({
      samples, eventPrefix, armNum, enrollmentEvent, configForm, asiSurveyForm, parsedProject
    }),
    asis: generateASIs({
      samples, eventPrefix, armNum, enrollmentEvent,
      deliverAtPrefix, asiSurveyForm, asiLogic, asiSender, asiSubject, asiBody,
      fieldNameA, fieldNameC, fieldNameM, parsedProject
    })
  };
}
```

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
downloadSection = {
  if (!generatedOutputs) {
    return html`<div class="alert alert-warning">Generate a sample schedule first (Step 4) to enable downloads.</div>`;
  }

  const container = html`<div style="display: flex; gap: 0.5rem; flex-wrap: wrap; margin-bottom: 1rem;"></div>`;

  const zipBtn = document.createElement("button");
  zipBtn.style.cssText = "background: #0d6efd; border: 1px solid #0d6efd; color: white; padding: 0.375rem 0.75rem; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer; font-weight: 600;";
  zipBtn.textContent = "Download All (ZIP)";
  zipBtn.addEventListener("click", () => {
    const zip = new JSZip();
    zip.file("data_dictionary.csv", generatedOutputs.dictionary);
    zip.file("events.csv", generatedOutputs.events);
    zip.file("event_mappings.csv", generatedOutputs.mappings);
    zip.file("asi_list.csv", generatedOutputs.asis);
    zip.generateAsync({ type: "blob" }).then(blob => {
      const link = document.createElement("a");
      link.href = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
      link.download = "ema_schedule.zip";
      link.click();
      URL.revokeObjectURL(link.href);
    });
  });
  container.appendChild(zipBtn);

  const files = [
    { name: "Data Dictionary", data: generatedOutputs.dictionary, filename: "data_dictionary.csv" },
    { name: "Events", data: generatedOutputs.events, filename: "events.csv" },
    { name: "Event Mappings", data: generatedOutputs.mappings, filename: "event_mappings.csv" },
    { name: "ASIs", data: generatedOutputs.asis, filename: "asi_list.csv" }
  ];

  files.forEach(file => {
    const btn = document.createElement("button");
    btn.style.cssText = "background: white; border: 1px solid #6c757d; color: #6c757d; padding: 0.375rem 0.75rem; border-radius: 4px; cursor: pointer;";
    btn.textContent = file.name;
    btn.addEventListener("click", () => {
      const blob = new Blob([file.data], { type: "text/csv;charset=utf-8;" });
      const link = document.createElement("a");
      link.href = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
      link.download = file.filename;
      link.click();
      URL.revokeObjectURL(link.href);
    });
    container.appendChild(btn);
  });

  return container;
}
```

```{ojs}
//| echo: false
```

```{ojs}
// ============================================================================
// GENERATION FUNCTIONS
// ============================================================================

function generateDataDictionary({ samples, configForm, startField, randPrefix, seedField, deliverAtPrefix, fieldNameA, fieldNameC, fieldNameM, LCG_A, LCG_C, LCG_M, asiSurveyForm }) {
  const headers = [
    "Variable / Field Name", "Form Name", "Section Header", "Field Type", "Field Label",
    "Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels", "Field Note", "Text Validation Type OR Show Slider Number",
    "Text Validation Min", "Text Validation Max", "Identifier?", "Branching Logic (Show field only if...)",
    "Required Field?", "Custom Alignment", "Question Number (surveys only)", "Matrix Group Name",
    "Matrix Ranking?", "Field Annotation"
  ];

  const rows = [headers];

  // Record ID field (required for new projects)
  rows.push(["record_id", configForm, "", "text", "Record ID", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", ""]);

  // Seed input field (defaults to record name)
  rows.push([seedField, configForm, "EMA Configuration", "text", "Seed input", "", "Initial seed for random number generator", "integer", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", `@DEFAULT='[record-name]' @HIDDEN`]);

  // Start date/time field
  rows.push([startField, configForm, "", "text", "EMA start date/time", "", "When EMA sampling begins", "datetime_seconds_ymd", "", "", "", "", "y", "", "", "", "", ""]);

  // LCG constants with hardcoded values
  rows.push([fieldNameA, configForm, "PRNG Constants", "text", "LCG multiplier (a)", "", "", "integer", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", `@DEFAULT='${LCG_A}' @HIDDEN`]);
  rows.push([fieldNameC, configForm, "", "text", "LCG increment (c)", "", "", "integer", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", `@DEFAULT='${LCG_C}' @HIDDEN`]);
  rows.push([fieldNameM, configForm, "", "text", "LCG modulus (m)", "", "", "integer", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", `@DEFAULT='${LCG_M}' @HIDDEN`]);

  // Seed processing field
  rows.push([
    "seed", configForm, "", "calc", "Seed (processed)",
    `mod((([${fieldNameA}] * mod((([${fieldNameA}] * mod((([${fieldNameA}] * [${seedField}]) + [${fieldNameC}]), [${fieldNameM}])) + [${fieldNameC}]), [${fieldNameM}])) + [${fieldNameC}]), [${fieldNameM}])`,
    "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "@HIDDEN"
  ]);

  // Random number fields
  samples.forEach((sample, idx) => {
    const randField = `${randPrefix}_${String(idx + 1).padStart(2, '0')}`;
    const prevField = idx === 0 ? "seed" : `${randPrefix}_${String(idx).padStart(2, '0')}`;
    rows.push([
      randField, configForm, idx === 0 ? "Random Numbers" : "", "calc",
      `Random ${String(idx + 1).padStart(2, '0')}`,
      `mod((([${fieldNameA}] * [${prevField}]) + [${fieldNameC}]), [${fieldNameM}])`,
      "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "@HIDDEN"
    ]);
  });

  // Deliver-at fields
  samples.forEach((sample, idx) => {
    const dayPadded = String(sample.day).padStart(2, '0');
    const samplePadded = String(sample.sample).padStart(2, '0');
    const fieldName = `${deliverAtPrefix}_d${dayPadded}_s${samplePadded}`;
    const randField = `${randPrefix}_${String(idx + 1).padStart(2, '0')}`;
    const dayOffset = sample.day - 1;
    const calcAnnotation = `@CALCDATE([${startField}], (${dayOffset} * 1440) + ${sample.startMinutes} + mod([${randField}], ${sample.duration}), 'm')`;

    rows.push([
      fieldName, configForm, idx === 0 ? "EMA Schedule" : "", "text",
      `Day ${sample.day} Sample ${sample.sample}`, "", "", "datetime_seconds_ymd",
      "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", calcAnnotation
    ]);
  });

  // Placeholder EMA survey form
  rows.push([`${asiSurveyForm}_placeholder`, asiSurveyForm, "", "descriptive", "<div class=\"rich-text-field-label\"><p>Add your EMA survey questions here.</p></div>", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", ""]);

  return rows.map(row => row.map(cell => `"${String(cell).replace(/"/g, '""')}"`).join(",")).join("\n");
}

function generateEvents({ samples, eventPrefix, armNum, enrollmentEvent }) {
  const headers = ["event_name", "arm_num", "unique_event_name", "custom_event_label"];
  const rows = [headers];
  rows.push([enrollmentEvent, armNum, `${enrollmentEvent}_arm_${armNum}`, ""]);

  const seenEvents = new Set();
  samples.forEach(sample => {
    const dayPadded = String(sample.day).padStart(2, '0');
    const samplePadded = String(sample.sample).padStart(2, '0');
    const eventName = `${eventPrefix}_d${dayPadded}_s${samplePadded}`;
    if (!seenEvents.has(eventName)) {
      seenEvents.add(eventName);
      rows.push([eventName, armNum, `${eventName}_arm_${armNum}`, ""]);
    }
  });

  return rows.map(row => row.join(",")).join("\n");
}

function generateEventMappings({ samples, eventPrefix, armNum, enrollmentEvent, configForm, asiSurveyForm }) {
  const headers = ["arm_num", "unique_event_name", "form"];
  const rows = [headers];
  rows.push([armNum, `${enrollmentEvent}_arm_${armNum}`, configForm]);

  const seenEvents = new Set();
  samples.forEach(sample => {
    const dayPadded = String(sample.day).padStart(2, '0');
    const samplePadded = String(sample.sample).padStart(2, '0');
    const eventName = `${eventPrefix}_d${dayPadded}_s${samplePadded}`;
    if (!seenEvents.has(eventName)) {
      seenEvents.add(eventName);
      rows.push([armNum, `${eventName}_arm_${armNum}`, asiSurveyForm]);
    }
  });

  return rows.map(row => row.join(",")).join("\n");
}

function generateASIs({ samples, eventPrefix, armNum, enrollmentEvent, deliverAtPrefix, asiSurveyForm, asiLogic, asiSender, asiSubject, asiBody }) {
  const headers = [
    "form_name", "event_name", "condition_surveycomplete_form_name", "condition_surveycomplete_event_name",
    "num_recurrence", "units_recurrence", "max_recurrence", "active", "email_subject", "email_content",
    "email_sender", "email_sender_display", "condition_andor", "condition_logic", "condition_send_time_option",
    "condition_send_time_lag_days", "condition_send_time_lag_hours", "condition_send_time_lag_minutes",
    "condition_send_time_lag_field", "condition_send_time_lag_field_after", "condition_send_next_day_type",
    "condition_send_next_time", "condition_send_time_exact", "delivery_type", "reminder_type",
    "reminder_timelag_days", "reminder_timelag_hours", "reminder_timelag_minutes", "reminder_nextday_type",
    "reminder_nexttime", "reminder_exact_time", "reminder_num", "reeval_before_send"
  ];

  const rows = [headers];
  const enrollEventName = `${enrollmentEvent}_arm_${armNum}`;

  samples.forEach(sample => {
    const dayPadded = String(sample.day).padStart(2, '0');
    const samplePadded = String(sample.sample).padStart(2, '0');
    const eventName = `${eventPrefix}_d${dayPadded}_s${samplePadded}_arm_${armNum}`;
    const deliverField = `[${enrollEventName}][${deliverAtPrefix}_d${dayPadded}_s${samplePadded}]`;

    // Add event prefix to logic if needed
    let logicWithEvent = asiLogic;
    if (asiLogic.includes("[") && !asiLogic.includes(`[${enrollEventName}]`)) {
      logicWithEvent = asiLogic.replace(/\[([^\]]+)\]/g, `[${enrollEventName}][$1]`);
    }

    rows.push([
      asiSurveyForm, eventName, "", "", "0", "DAYS", "", "1",
      asiSubject, asiBody, asiSender, "", "AND", logicWithEvent,
      "TIME_LAG", "0", "0", "0", deliverField, "after", "", "", "",
      "EMAIL", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "0", "1"
    ]);
  });

  return rows.map(row => row.map(cell => `"${String(cell).replace(/"/g, '""')}"`).join(",")).join("\n");
}

// ============================================================================
// XML PARSING
// ============================================================================

function parseRedcapXml(xmlText) {
  const parser = new DOMParser();
  const doc = parser.parseFromString(xmlText, "text/xml");

  const studyName = doc.querySelector("StudyName")?.textContent || "Unknown Project";

  const forms = [];
  doc.querySelectorAll("FormDef").forEach(form => {
    forms.push({
      oid: form.getAttribute("OID"),
      name: form.getAttribute("redcap:FormName") || form.getAttribute("Name"),
      label: form.getAttribute("Name")
    });
  });

  const events = [];
  doc.querySelectorAll("StudyEventDef").forEach(event => {
    events.push({
      oid: event.getAttribute("OID"),
      name: event.getAttribute("redcap:EventName"),
      uniqueName: event.getAttribute("redcap:UniqueEventName"),
      armNum: event.getAttribute("redcap:ArmNum")
    });
  });

  const fields = [];
  doc.querySelectorAll("ItemDef").forEach(item => {
    fields.push({
      name: item.getAttribute("redcap:Variable") || item.getAttribute("Name"),
      type: item.getAttribute("redcap:FieldType"),
      annotation: item.getAttribute("redcap:FieldAnnotation") || "",
      calculation: item.getAttribute("redcap:Calculation") || ""
    });
  });

  const emaFields = fields.filter(f =>
    f.annotation.includes("@CALCDATE") && f.name.match(/_d\d+_s\d+$/)
  );

  return { projectName: studyName, forms, events, fields, emaFields };
}
```
